title: How to Create a Mii of Violent J on the Nintendo Wii

steps.headline: In the face tab, pick the 1st face in the first row.
He should have the spiky blonde hair in the first page.
Pick the circular eyebrow on the 1st row of the first page.
steps.description: Make it black. Move it up 2 times, make it bigger 2 times, rotate it up 2 times and narrow it 2 times.

steps.headline: For the eyes, choose the first one in the 3rd page.
steps.description: Rotate it up 3 times and widen once.

steps.headline: Choose the 1st nose in the 2nd row.
steps.description: Move it down to its maximum and make it bigger 2 times. This will later become the mouth of his face paint.

steps.headline: Inside the mouth tab, choose the last one in the first row.
steps.description: Move it up once and make it bigger 2 times.

steps.headline: Go into the moustaches.
steps.description: Choose the second one in the 2nd row. Make it black.

steps.headline: Go into the beard tab.
steps.description: Choose the 2nd one in the second row. Make it black.

steps.headline: To make the nose, use the mole.
Voila!
steps.description: You now have a mii of your friendly neighborhood serial killing clown!

text: In the face tab, pick the 1st face in the first row.  He should have the spiky blonde hair in the first page.  Pick the circular eyebrow on the 1st row of the first page. Make it black. Move it up 2 times, make it bigger 2 times, rotate it up 2 times and narrow it 2 times. For the eyes, choose the first one in the 3rd page. Rotate it up 3 times and widen once. Choose the 1st nose in the 2nd row. Move it down to its maximum and make it bigger 2 times. This will later become the mouth of his face paint. Inside the mouth tab, choose the last one in the first row. Move it up once and make it bigger 2 times. Go into the moustaches. Choose the second one in the 2nd row. Make it black. Go into the beard tab. Choose the 2nd one in the second row. Make it black. To make the nose, use the mole. Move it in the center. Voila! You now have a mii of your friendly neighborhood serial killing clown!
